titles.title: Miscellaneous Tariff Act of 1993
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16457)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Miscellaneous Tariff Act of 1993 - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on certain organic chemicals.
